```{r}
# libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(summarytools)

# load data
nb <- readRDS("Data/nb.rds")
```

```{r}
# glucose summary
nb %>%
  select(Glucose) %>%
  descr(stats = c("mean", "sd", "min", "med", "max")) %>%
  tb() %>%
  kable()
```
